data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Saldaitis, Aidas, Volynkin, Anton V., Dûda, Juozas (2018): Lemyra elena, a new species from Sichuan, south-western China (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae). Zootaxa 4418 (2): 187-193, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4418.2.8
